scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --save-dev @types/react @types/react-dom typescript && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
